content: **introduction** the biased scrubby is a square scrubby perfect for cleaning the house removing makeup washing faces and bodies or gifting to others ideal for quick projects this scrubby can be completed in under an hour working flat the pattern begins with a two-stitch cast-on followed by increases every other row once you reach the maximum width of the scrubby decreases are worked every other row until three stitches remain whether you re knitting for personal use or to sell this pattern is a joy to create if using this pattern for sales please credit me as the designer happy knitting **strong text**skills this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable with or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques bind-off cast-on knit knit front and back and knit 2 together not familiar with these techniques no problem the pattern includes links to helpful tutorial videos to guide you every step of the way **materials** **yarn recommendations** yarn bee scrub-ology cotton fiber content cotton 100% 125 yards/114 meters 3 oz/85 g or any similar yarn that knits to gauge **sample used ** 6 11 16 17 yards/6 11 15 16 meters 0 125 0 25 0 375 0 4 oz/4 8 11 12 g 1 ball in front porch colorway **knitting needles** us size 8/5 mm or size used to match gauge - straight or circular as you prefer **notions** locking stitch markers to mark rs of fabric scissors tapestry needle **gauge** 16 sts x 32 row over 4 /10 cm in garter stitch worked flat it is not necessary to match gauge for this pattern if you knit with a gauge different from that in the pattern your biased scrubby will end up a different finished width and this will affect the amount of yarn needed **size information** xs s m l **finished measurements** 2 75x2 75 3 5x3 5 4x4 4 75x4 75 inches or 7x7 8 5x8 5 10 5x10 5 12x12 cm this pattern is available for free on my blog or you can purchase it as part of the ozzylosi knits scrubby collection pattern book 1 https //www ozzylosiknitdesigns com/summer-of-scrubbies-2025/
